channel.title: RealSense on RobotFlow
channel.description: Recent content in RealSense on RobotFlow

item.title: 手眼标定介绍与使用
item.description: Robotic Hand-eye Calibration Workspace | Ubuntu 1804 & ROS Melodic Morenia | This repo contains a eye-in-hand calibration tool (Cplusplus & ROS) in JD京东 GRASPING ROBOT CHALLENGE (News), and the implements of my paper: Robotic hand-eye calibration with depth camera: A sphere model approach (PDF) Inside /src there are 5 ROS packages: rgbd_srv used by camera_driver. camera_driver drive Intel® RealSense™ RGBD cameras in ROS. (convert raw stream to ros sensor_msgs::Image)
